actor_awards.notes: Renowned for her 'peek-a-boo' hairstyle and femme fatale roles; received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

filmography.title: Sullivan's Travels
filmography.role_description: A struggling actress who accompanies a disillusioned Hollywood director on his journey as a hobo.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood director disguises himself as a bum to experience the hardships of the common man for a serious film project.

filmography.title: This Gun for Hire
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer and magician's assistant who gets entangled with a hitman while spying for the government.
filmography.plot: A contract killer is double-crossed by his employer and goes on the run, aided by a nightclub singer who tries to reform him.

filmography.title: I Married a Witch
filmography.role_description: A mischievous 17th-century witch burned at the stake who returns to torment the descendant of her accuser.
filmography.plot: A witch returns to life to ruin the wedding of a politician, only to fall in love with him instead.

filmography.title: The Glass Key
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a reform candidate who becomes involved in a murder mystery and a romance with a political fixer.
filmography.plot: A political fixer tries to clear his boss of a murder charge while dealing with gangsters and corrupt politicians.

filmography.title: The Blue Dahlia
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of a nightclub owner who helps a framed veteran clear his name.
filmography.plot: A returning war veteran is accused of murdering his unfaithful wife and must find the real killer in the seedy Los Angeles underworld.

filmography.title: So Proudly We Hail!
filmography.role_description: A bitter, self-sacrificing army nurse who seeks revenge for the death of her fiancé.
filmography.plot: The story of a group of Red Cross nurses in the Philippines during the early days of World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress (Paulette Goddard)

filmography.title: I Wanted Wings
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who becomes the center of a tragic love triangle; the role that made her a star.
filmography.plot: Three young men from different backgrounds join the Air Corps and vie for their wings and the same girl.

filmography.title: Ramrod
filmography.role_description: A headstrong ranch owner who defies her father and hires a gunman to fight a cattle baron.
filmography.plot: A woman inherits a ranch and hires a recovering alcoholic as her foreman to fight a powerful cattle baron.

filmography.title: Saigon
filmography.role_description: A mysterious secretary accompanying a terminally ill pilot on a dangerous smuggling mission.
filmography.plot: Three war buddies undertake a dangerous flying mission in Southeast Asia, discovering smuggling and romance along the way.

filmography.title: Slattery's Hurricane
filmography.role_description: The secretary and former lover of a pilot who flies into a hurricane, caught in a drug smuggling plot.
filmography.plot: A pilot recounts his life and loves while flying a plane into the eye of a storm.

filmography.title: The Hour Before the Dawn
filmography.role_description: An Austrian refugee who marries a British conscientious objector but is secretly a Nazi spy.
filmography.plot: A pacifist marries a refugee who turns out to be a Nazi agent guiding bombers to targets in England.

filmography.title: Bring on the Girls
filmography.role_description: A gold-digging cigarette girl who targets a wealthy man who has joined the Navy.
filmography.plot: A millionaire joins the Navy to find a girl who will love him for himself, not his money.

filmography.title: Out of This World
filmography.role_description: A secretary who organizes an all-female band and discovers a singer with a voice like Bing Crosby.
filmography.plot: A female band leader hires a shy singer who becomes a sensation because his voice sounds exactly like Bing Crosby.

filmography.title: Duffy's Tavern
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself in this all-star variety film based on the popular radio show.
filmography.plot: The staff of a radio show tavern try to help a record manufacturer get out of financial trouble with a block party.

filmography.title: Hold That Blonde!
filmography.role_description: A member of a jewel thief gang who falls in love with a kleptomaniac millionaire.
filmography.plot: A kleptomaniac rich man gets mixed up with a gang of jewel thieves and a beautiful woman.

filmography.title: Miss Susie Slagle's
filmography.role_description: A nursing student who falls in love with a medical intern in 1910 Baltimore.
filmography.plot: A group of medical students live in a boarding house run by a kindly spinster while navigating their studies and romances.

filmography.title: The Sainted Sisters
filmography.role_description: A con artist on the run who ends up in a small town and is mistaken for a charitable do-gooder.
filmography.plot: Two sisters who are con artists flee New York for Maine, where they try to swindle the locals but have a change of heart.

filmography.title: Isn't It Romantic?
filmography.role_description: One of three daughters of a Confederate major who is courted by a variety of suitors in Indiana.
filmography.plot: A Confederate major and his three daughters settle in Indiana, where they deal with romance and financial troubles.

filmography.title: Stronghold
filmography.role_description: An American woman who returns to Mexico to manage her silver mine and gets caught in a revolution.
filmography.plot: During the Mexican revolution against Maximilian, a woman tries to protect her silver mine from bandits and rebels.

filmography.title: Footsteps in the Snow
filmography.role_description: A minor role in a Canadian thriller; one of her few later screen appearances.
filmography.plot: A psychotic killer terrorizes a ski lodge during a snowstorm.

filmography.title: Flesh Feast
filmography.role_description: A mad scientist who breeds flesh-eating maggots to exact revenge on Adolf Hitler; Lake's final film.
filmography.plot: A scientist develops maggots that eat human flesh and plans to use them on a clone of Hitler.

filmography.title: Star Spangled Rhythm
filmography.role_description: Appears in the musical number 'A Sweater, a Sarong and a Peek-a-Boo Bang' alongside Paulette Goddard and Dorothy Lamour.
filmography.plot: A sailor in Hollywood tries to get his sister a movie contract, leading to a variety show featuring Paramount stars.

filmography.title: Variety Girl
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance in this musical comedy that features numerous Paramount contract players.
filmography.plot: Two young women try to break into the movies at Paramount Studios, encountering various stars along the way.

filmography.title: All Women Have Secrets
filmography.role_description: A small role as a student in this comedy about young married couples; credited as Constance Keane.
filmography.plot: Three young couples try to keep their marriages secret so they can continue their college studies.

filmography.title: Sorority House
filmography.role_description: An uncredited role as a college student; considered her first screen appearance.
filmography.plot: A naive freshman tries to fit in at a college sorority, dealing with snobbery and social pressure.
